item.description:
Join John, our host, at the Atomic Cafe Coffee House in Downtown Beverly for a Kitty Whist Card Game Night. Enjoy a night spent playing games and drinking what is reputed to be the best coffee on the North Shore--a great combination. In addition to beverages, the cafe also feautres a sandwich, pastry, salad, and soup menu.

Don't be scared off by the title of the game, no experience is necessary, we will be a learning how to play the game on the game night. It is the easiest Whist game to learn, with an element of ramdomness built into the game (the 4 unknown cards, "the kitty").

Learn more about The Atomic Cafe at http://www.atomicafe....

Everyone will meet up at 6:30 p.m. at the cafe, which closes at 9:00 p.m.

Also, the contact number below belongs to John, not to Atomic Cafe.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Kitty Whist Night
